articles.title: ‘Laverne & Shirley’ and ‘Twin Peaks’ actor David Lander has died - NME
articles.description: David Lander, best known as Squiggy in US sitcom 'Laverne & Shirley', has died aged 73 due to complications related to multiple sclerosis.
articles.content:
David Lander, best known for his role as Squiggy in American sitcom Laverne & Shirley, has died aged 73.

articles.title: 'The Queen's Gambit' is sparking a surge of interest in chess - CNN
articles.description: David Bradley spends most weekends engaged in intense chess matches with his 15-year-old daughter, Zoe. They stare at the board for hours and plot their next moves, consumed by a new shared pastime.
